name: Love Quest Demo
description:
This is the demo of a game I'm creating called Love Quest! Try to start a relationship with one of three sisters; El, Jess, or Mary! Please note that I am very new at this, so try to be as positive as you can with your feedback! Thank you!

Also, the project used to be called Danky's Test, so some of the files may be called that. That will be fixed by the full game!

For updates, please visit our homepage here!
